mapper.insert: insert into fboard(f_no,mem_no,f_sj,f_ct, f_fl,f_rc, f_dt,f_lk,f_lkno) values(fboard_seq.nextval,#{mem_no},#{f_sj},#{f_ct}, #{f_fl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0, sysdate,0,#{f_lkno})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, mem_no,f_sj,f_ct, f_fl,f_rc, f_dt,f_lk,f_lkno from (select * from fboard order by bbs_re_ref desc, bbs_re_seq asc) ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * #{limit}+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{limit})
